        public void dropDownAction​(Types type,
                           int amount)
        Handles setting DiceManagers in diceSet based on what was selected and how much
        Parameters:
        type - The type of DiceManager being set
        amount - Amount of dice the DiceManager knows about (0 removes existing from the list)
